name: awilix-manager
description: Wrapper over awilix to support more complex use-cases, such as async init and eager injection

scripts.build:release: del-cli dist && del-cli coverage && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.lint: biome lint index.ts lib test biome.json && tsc --project tsconfig.lint.json --noEmit
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --apply index.ts lib test biome.json
